title: 0% reconnect Issue, gets put in lower priority
body:
So I was playing a game of ranked and I disconnected. OK, I saw that notice about people having issues reconnecting. I didn't think much of it UNTIL this moment. It was at this moment. That I knew. I f***ed up. By the time I got in to queue, I didn't have the second notice, saying that I should restart my client. Who knew I would get placed in lower priority for something that the system had an error with... You should have at least turned the LeaverBuster system off if you can't get people out of Lower Priority Queue. Because I remember seeing a statement from Riot saying that they can't take anyone out of lower priority queue to avoid corruption...  If I even got that message which wasn't possible because on the reconnect screen, where it sys "Game is still in progress" or "Your game has crashed, Reconnect", the notice signs don't show up. So of course, I tried to reconnect several times and even waited out the whole thing to see it it loads until the game ended, and I was placed in lower priority queue. I know it was stupid of me to not try to restart my client, but... seriously? If I asked for support, you would probably send a ticket saying "send us various files from your game/client" which 80% of the time no ones bothered, which leads to frustration.

I don't know what to say but if I had to be 100% honest I would say: Get me out of lower priority queue, or something of an equal value that makes up for the time I would lose on waiting for that BS.

replies.body:
I'll just tell your the truth; it's not likely going to happen. Even if you somehow get the attention of a human red then they'll probably stick to their mission statement than listen to one player.

Leavebuster wasn't turned off/loss prevent wasn't turned on because the majority of players are actually unaffected by this.
